title: Vegetarians in Motion
description: Vegetarians in Motion (VIM) was formed in 1988 in Rockford, ILÂ  by a few dedicated individuals who wanted to provide education and support for those interested in a vegetarian lifestyle.Â  People join VIM for important reasons - health, animal suffering, world hunger, and the environment.Â Monthly meetings offer potlucks and educational programs.Â  In addition, VIM sponsors an annual Turkey-Free Thanksgiving Dinner, serves lunch to the mentally ill and homeless, plans restaurant nights, and sponsors bus trips to veggie-friendly stores.
